data.text: @BenAffleck make the most kickass Batman movie you can. There is no future movie I want to see more and you can bet on it. Goodnight.
@BenAffleck you said you were in early production for Batman's first standalone movie. I hope you still have that same dedication and...
@BenAffleck you can revive all of the DCEU and put it on track with your brilliance in movie making. I remember how dedicated you said...
@BenAffleck I just want you to know what kind of an opportunity you have hear. You are arguably the best actor to put the Batsuit on and...
